citations.narrative:
The outside exercise pen (the 'Big Yard') in which 9 dogs were exercising had a protruding section of plastic flashing,
@6x11 inches, with a jagged edge and tooth marks, that was pulled away from the junction of the foundation and siding.
Sharp edges on enclosures may present a risk of injury. The facility must ensure that enclosures are maintained to
prevent injury.
Correct by 12 September 2023.
An additional @6x10 inch section of the cement block foundation of the housing facility that functions as one wall of the
outdoor exercise pen (the 'Big Yard') had a buildup of green to black organic material associated with a constant drip of
water at the time of the inspection. The source of the water was unidentified. Ongoing water leaks may lead to
contamination of the exercise yard and a weakening of the floor of the housing facility itself. The facility must ensure the
housing is maintained in good repair.
Correct by 05 December, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.1(a) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
The outside exercise pen (the 'Big Yard') in which 9 dogs were exercising had a protruding section of plastic flashing, 
@6x11 inches, with a jagged edge and tooth marks, that was pulled away from the junction of the foundation and siding. 
Sharp edges on enclosures may present a risk of injury. The facility must ensure that enclosures are maintained to 
prevent injury. 
 
Correct by 12 September 2023. 
 
An additional @6x10 inch section of the cement block foundation of the housing facility that functions as one wall of the 
outdoor exercise pen (the 'Big Yard') had a buildup of green to black organic material associated with a constant drip of 
water at the time of the inspection. The source of the water was unidentified. Ongoing water leaks may lead to 
contamination of the exercise yard and a weakening of the floor of the housing facility itself. The facility must ensure the 
housing is maintained in good repair.  
 
Correct by 05 December, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
